typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		transaction_id as long,
		customer_id as long,
		product_id as long,
		merchant_name as string,
		transaction_description as string,
		transaction_amount as long,
		type_deposit_withdrawal as string,
		transaction_date as timestamp,
		channel as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> Transactions
Transactions, Customers assert(expectTrue(!isNull(transaction_id), false, 'srIDNotNull'),
	expectExists(Transactions@customer_id == Customers@customer_id, false, 'custIDExists'),
	expectTrue(!isNull(transaction_amount), false, 'transactionAmt')) ~> Assert1
Assert1 filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
Assert1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TransactionsClean
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> transactionsErrors
